title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table are being displayed in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
OB: When the datetime values are retrieved from the table and displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item, they are shown in different formats.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from the table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item. 
3. Compare the format in which the datetime values are displayed in both items.
